column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=Last summer , I was riding my bike and I must have ran over something sharp because my tire started going flat .
#id=2
#text=I tried to use a repair kit , but the hole was too big and the patch would not stay on the old tube .
#id=3
#text=It turns out that I ran over a screw and it had been lodged through the tire and into the tube .
#id=4
#text=I knew that I had a twenty six inch wheel , so I went up to the local hardware store .
#id=5
#text=They had a new tube and I bought a new tire , just in case there were any other problems .
#id=6
#text=I followed the instructions and I took the old tire off .
#id=7
#text=The somehow got the new tube and tire onto the wheel , but it was kind of a pain to do .
#id=8
#text=I finally got it on and all that I had to do was put in some air .
#id=9
#text=I plugged in my air compressor but it would not turn on for some reason .
#text=I found an old tire pump buried in my garage and I was finally able to put air into the tires .
#text=In the future , I am going to be more careful to avoid sharp exits because repairing the flat tire was a pain .
